attributes.action: Investigate  employees of ATOS  for incorrect diagnosis and Wilful Misconduct in Public Office
attributes.additional_details:
Many people who have previously been on Incapacity Benefit for ten years or more,  suddenly find themselves being awarded  "Nil points"  after an ATOS  assessment.

Thousands of those people  are getting those assessments  changed on appeal.

The DWP  needs to perform an audit  on ATOS,  and consider  terminating its contract with ATOS.
